name: Mendel
description: Mendel is a chill sandbox game about growing weird plants from alien genetics.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 @ 2GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4xxx or better Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: On-board
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 @ 2.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU with 1GB+ of VRAM Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: On-board
